title: Botanic man. - Volume 2: Episodes 5-7.

description: A compilation of David Bellamy's "Land of opportunity", "Latitude zero", and "White death: new life". Contents include the botanical uniqueness of New Zealand, the role of animals in plant reproduction, the ecological contrasts of Ecuador's Andes, and the glacial origins of Canada's wheatlands.
